extendedInfo.description: Memory Legend Game!Challenge your memory by matching the same pictures. The pictures are hidden. Need your memory to remember them! We offer one game modes: time modeA memory game for kids, but you grown-ups may find it challenging too.A memory game for kids, but you grown-ups may find yourselves struggling to beat your kids' times in matching all the pairs.The object of the game is to turn over pairs of matching cards. It's easy. Tap to flip two cards. Match a pair and they disappear. But flip quickly ... the clock is ticking. Your brain's memory will be challenged on various levels as we have incorporated various images from different themes. Some of the themes are harder than others as the disctintions can be very specific.Features:* 4 Difficulty Levels (for kid,easy,normal,hard)* 4 Flip Over Time* Multiple Tile Themes (star,question,secret)* High Scores*Scoreloop integration(with update)Keywords:Memory,Match,Memory Match,Speed,Smart
